original_text: But since we belong to the day, let us be sober, putting on faith and love as a breastplate, and the hope of salvation as a helmet.
korean_text: 우리는 낮에 속하였으니 정신을 차리고 믿음과 사랑의 호심경을 붙이고 구원의 소망의 투구를 쓰자

sentences.original_text: But since we belong to the day
putting on faith and love as a breastplate
and the hope of salvation as a helmet
